overview: GCW returns after a hiatus to present Maniac 2022 event on May 21, 2022. The event will be the first one this weekend to take place at the Ukrainian Cultural Center in Los Angeles, CA.  AJ Gray will have to defend the Extreme title in a six-way scramble against the likes of Jack Cartwheel, Ninja Mack, Jimmy Lloyd, Cole Radrick, and John Murdoch. Bussy will defend the GCW Tag Team Championship. In singles matches, Joey Janela takes on Drew Parker while Bandido faces Nick Wayne.
title: GCW Maniac
